fullplot: When a group of scientists are offered funding into genetic research if they agree to try and clone the greatest ever Pokèmon, Mew, the end result is success and Mewtwo is born. However Mewtwo is bitter about his purpose in life and kills his masters. In order to become the greatest he throws open a challenge to the world to battle him and his Pokèmon. Ash and his friends are one of the few groups of trainers who pass the first test and prepare for battle. However they soon find out about further cloning and Mewtwo's ultimate plan for the earth.
plot: Scientists genetically create a new Pokèmon, Mewtwo, but the results are horrific and disastrous.
title: Pokèmon: The First Movie - Mewtwo Strikes Back

tomatoes.consensus: Audiences other than children will find very little to entertain them.
